00029 template<class T> class ckTree
00030 {
00031 public:
00033     ckDefineException(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00034     ckDefineException(ExceptionInvalidCall);
00035     ckDefineException(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00037 
00041     ckTree()
00042     {
00043         m_self = NULL;
00044         m_parent = NULL;
00045         m_last_child = NULL;
00046         m_prev = m_next = NULL;
00047     }
00048 
00052     ~ckTree()
00053     {
00054         leave();
00055         clear();
00056     }
00057 
00063     void init(T* self)
00064     {
00065         if (!self)
00066         {
00067             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00068         }
00069 
00070         m_self = self;
00071     }
00072 
00077     T* getSelf() const
00078     {
00079         if (!m_self)
00080         {
00081             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00082         }
00083 
00084         return m_self;
00085     }
00086 
00091     bool hasParent() const
00092     {
00093         return m_parent ? true : false;
00094     }
00095 
00101     ckTree<T>* getParentN() const
00102     {
00103         return m_parent;
00104     }
00105 
00112     ckTree<T>* getPrevAllN() const
00113     {
00114         return m_prev;
00115     }
00116 
00123     ckTree<T>* getNextAllN() const
00124     {
00125         return m_next;
00126     }
00127 
00133     ckTree<T>* getPrevSiblingN() const
00134     {
00135         if (!hasParent())
00136         {
00137             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidCall);
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (m_prev != m_parent)
00141         {
00142             ckTree<T>* prev = m_prev;
00143 
00144             while (prev->m_parent != m_parent)
00145             {
00146                 prev = prev->m_parent;
00147             }
00148 
00149             return prev;
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153             return NULL;
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00162     ckTree<T>* getNextSiblingN() const
00163     {
00164         if (!hasParent())
00165         {
00166             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidCall);
00167         }
00168 
00169         ckTree<T>* desc = getLastDescendant();
00170         ckTree<T>* next = desc->m_next;
00171 
00172         return (next && next->m_parent == m_parent) ? next : NULL;
00173     }
00174 
00179     void joinBefore(ckTree<T>* tree)
00180     {
00181         if (!tree || tree == this || !tree->hasParent())
00182         {
00183             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00184         }
00185 
00186         for (ckTree<T>* parent = tree->m_parent; parent; parent = parent->m_parent)
00187         {
00188             if (parent == this)
00189             {
00190                 ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00191             }
00192         }
00193 
00194         leave();
00195 
00196         ckTree<T>* desc = getLastDescendant();
00197 
00198         m_parent = tree->m_parent;
00199         m_prev = tree->m_prev;
00200         desc->m_next = tree;
00201 
00202         m_prev->m_next = this;
00203         desc->m_next->m_prev = desc;
00204     }
00205 
00210     void joinAfter(ckTree<T>* tree)
00211     {
00212         if (!tree || tree == this || !tree->hasParent())
00213         {
00214             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00215         }
00216 
00217         for (ckTree<T>* parent = tree->m_parent; parent; parent = parent->m_parent)
00218         {
00219             if (parent == this)
00220             {
00221                 ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00222             }
00223         }
00224 
00225         leave();
00226 
00227         ckTree<T>* tree_desc = tree->getLastDescendant();
00228         ckTree<T>* this_desc = getLastDescendant();
00229 
00230         m_parent = tree->m_parent;
00231         m_prev = tree_desc;
00232         this_desc->m_next = tree_desc->m_next;
00233 
00234         m_prev->m_next = this;
00235 
00236         if (this_desc->m_next)
00237         {
00238             this_desc->m_next->m_prev = this_desc;
00239         }
00240 
00241         if (m_parent->m_last_child == tree)
00242         {
00243             m_parent->m_last_child = this;
00244         }
00245     }
00246 
00250     void leave()
00251     {
00252         if (hasParent())
00253         {
00254             ckTree<T>* desc = getLastDescendant();
00255 
00256             if (m_parent->m_last_child == this)
00257             {
00258                 m_parent->m_last_child = getPrevSiblingN();
00259             }
00260 
00261             m_prev->m_next = desc->m_next;
00262 
00263             if (desc->m_next)
00264             {
00265                 desc->m_next->m_prev = m_prev;
00266             }
00267 
00268             m_parent = NULL;
00269             m_prev = desc->m_next = NULL;
00270         }
00271     }
00272 
00277     bool hasChild() const
00278     {
00279         return m_last_child ? true : false;
00280     }
00281 
00287     ckTree<T>* getFirstChildN() const
00288     {
00289         return hasChild() ? m_next : NULL;
00290     }
00291 
00297     ckTree<T>* getLastChildN() const
00298     {
00299         return m_last_child;
00300     }
00301 
00307     ckTree<T>* getLastDescendant() const
00308     {
00309         ckTree<T>* desc = const_cast<ckTree<T>*>(this);
00310 
00311         while (desc->m_last_child)
00312         {
00313             desc = desc->m_last_child;
00314         }
00315 
00316         return desc;
00317     }
00318 
00323     void addFirst(ckTree<T>* child)
00324     {
00325         if (!child || child == this)
00326         {
00327             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00328         }
00329 
00330         for (ckTree<T>* parent = m_parent; parent; parent = parent->m_parent)
00331         {
00332             if (parent == child)
00333             {
00334                 ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00335             }
00336         }
00337 
00338         child->leave();
00339 
00340         ckTree<T>* child_desc = child->getLastDescendant();
00341 
00342         child->m_parent = this;
00343         child->m_prev = this;
00344         child_desc->m_next = m_next;
00345 
00346         child->m_prev->m_next = child;
00347 
00348         if (child_desc->m_next)
00349         {
00350             child_desc->m_next->m_prev = child_desc;
00351         }
00352 
00353         if (!m_last_child)
00354         {
00355             m_last_child = child;
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00363     void addLast(ckTree<T>* child)
00364     {
00365         if (!child || child == this)
00366         {
00367             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00368         }
00369 
00370         for (ckTree<T>* parent = m_parent; parent; parent = parent->m_parent)
00371         {
00372             if (parent == child)
00373             {
00374                 ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00375             }
00376         }
00377 
00378         child->leave();
00379 
00380         ckTree<T>* this_desc = getLastDescendant();
00381         ckTree<T>* child_desc = child->getLastDescendant();
00382 
00383         child->m_parent = this;
00384         child->m_prev = this_desc;
00385         child_desc->m_next = this_desc->m_next;
00386 
00387         child->m_prev->m_next = child;
00388 
00389         if (child_desc->m_next)
00390         {
00391             child_desc->m_next->m_prev = child_desc;
00392         }
00393 
00394         m_last_child = child;
00395     }
00396 
00400     void clear()
00401     {
00402         while (hasChild())
00403         {
00404             getFirstChildN()->leave();
00405         }
00406     }
00407 
00408 private:
00409     ckTree(const ckTree<T>&) {}
00410     void operator=(const ckTree<T>&) {}
00411 
00412     T* m_self;
00413     ckTree<T>* m_parent;
00414     ckTree<T>* m_last_child;
00415     ckTree<T>* m_prev;
00416     ckTree<T>* m_next;
00417 };
